_header: From thence that Phebus with his beams bright
_description: The hymn ‘A solis ortus cardine’ — seven stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
ffrome thens þat phebus with hys bemys bryghtAperyth fyrst owt
                    of þe oryente…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…Thys is owr lord þis is owr creatureThat now is borne
                    Ihesu owre savyowre. Amen
BLAdd34193.Editions:
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             The Middle English Penitential Lyric.
Columbia University Studies in English.
         New York: Columbia Press, 1911: 18-20.
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             “Hymnal from MS. Additional 34193, British Museum.” 
             Medieval Studies in Memory of Gertrude Schoepperle Loomis.
            Roger Sherman Loomis, ed. 
         New York: Columbia UP, 1927: 443-88: 457-60.
